name: ModifySessionRecording
description:
Update session recording details for a specific environment.

Use this tool to update session recording information for a given project and session ID within a specific environment in Datadog. Call this tool when you need to modify the details of an existing session recording.

parameters.name: session_recording_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the session recording to update.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this session recording.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: Project ID to access. Obtain it via the /api/projects/ call.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: session_recording_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details to update a session recording. Includes fields like id, distinct_id, viewed, viewers, recording duration, activity, and other session metadata.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this session recording.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this session recording.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
